_comments: In the editor value change 'default' to 'nano', 'vi', or another terminal based editor.
Hosts will also be read from your ~/.ssh/config or /etc/ssh_config file, if available
For more information on how to configure, please see http://fitztrev.github.io/shuttle/

mitmproxy.name: Open mitmproxy
mitmproxy.cmd: echo didi | sudo -S networksetup -setwebproxy 'Wi-Fi' 127.0.0.1 8080 && sudo networksetup -setsecurewebproxy 'Wi-Fi' 127.0.0.1 8080 && mitmproxy && mitmproxy -p 8080

HTTP(S) Proxy.name: Turn on HTTP(S) Proxy
HTTP(S) Proxy.cmd: echo didi | sudo -S networksetup -setwebproxy 'Wi-Fi' 127.0.0.1 8080 && sudo networksetup -setsecurewebproxy 'Wi-Fi' 127.0.0.1 8080

HTTP(S) Proxy.name: Turn off HTTP(S) Proxy
HTTP(S) Proxy.cmd: echo didi | sudo -S networksetup -setwebproxystate 'Wi-Fi' off && sudo networksetup -setsecurewebproxystate 'Wi-Fi' off
